mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gray's new topographical map of Virginia and West Virginia / by Frank A. Gray
New topographical map of Virginia and West Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gray, Frank A.
O.W. Gray & Son.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Latest population figures printed on the map are from the 1870 census.
Two insets with same scale as map: Part of West Virginia the Panhandle -- South western Part of Virginia.

Four insets with different scales: Environs of Harper's Ferry (1:200,000) -- Hampton Roads and the approaches (1:250,000) -- Hypsometric sketch of Virginia and West Virginia 91:10,000,000) -- Norfolk Harbor (1:80,000)
With several textual notes printed on map.
Numbers "68" and "69" printed above left and right upper neatlines, respectively; without text on verso.
Issued in editions of Gray's National Atlas. See: Phillips, Atlases, no. 904 etc.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: Broken in two pieces at the fold. Elizabeth Cocke Coles Fund.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Maps--19th century.
West Virginia--Maps--19th century.
